text: Ara nihsandeha granthapraptadera madhye yara imana ane allah‌te ara ya tomadera kache abatirna hayeche ara ya ta dera kache nayila hayechila tate, allah‌ra kache binita, tara allah‌ra banisamuhera jan'ya sbalpamulya kamate yaya na. Era'i, -- edera jan'ya edera puraskara rayeche edera prabhura kache. Nihsandeha allah hiseba-nikese tatpara.
